channel.title: Help meeee
channel.description: how do you make a downloadable client for other people to play your server

item.title: Help meeee
item.dc:creator: @GerraOnline GerraOnline
item.description:
@GerraOnline wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:393854”]1. Get your client
2. Change the ip address to yours by going to client.java/gui.java
3. rar the client
4. upload to a site like mediafire
5. have friend download
6. make sure your server is on
7. friend can play with you
8. ???
9. profit[/quote]

fixed ^^

item.title: Help meeee

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

  1. Get your client
  2. Change the ip address to yours by going to client.java/gui.java
  3. rar the client
  4. upload to a site like mediafire
  5. have friend download
  6. make sure your server is on
  7. friend can play with you
